DOC.brief_summary: FIBER 4-year study evaluate implementation large-scale population-based colorectal cancer screen patient reminder coordinate follow-up program . The CRC screen program begin 2007 Kaiser Permanente Northwest ( KPNW ) , not-for- profit , integrate health system Oregon Washington . FIBER consist 1 ) practical randomize control trial start program , follow 2 ) longer-term cohort study remain eligible patient receive program , 3 ) qualitative evaluation . FIBER evaluate factor associate implementation success across multiple level : patient , primary care provider ( PCP ) team , specialist ( gastroenterologist , general surgeon , pathologist ) , health plan staff system .
DOC.brief_title: Focusing Implementation Bring Effective Reminders ( FIBER )
DOC.criteria: KPNW member since 2005 Men woman , aged 5080 due CRC screen 24month period time . KPNW member part previous quantitative study .
